column2: This task consists of creating the timing test testsuites/psxtmtests/psxtmcond01 for the POSIX API method when used in a particular manner. The test case is: pthread_cond_init. If there is no dash in the description then this is the only case of interest for that method. If there is no dash in the description then this is the only case of interest for that method. If there are multiple methods then test both methods. The test should be created using the test instantiation helper and templates in rtems-testing/rtems-test-templates. This test will be using the template: psxtmtest_init_destroy. See http://www.rtems.org/wiki/index.php/GoogleCodeInProjects#Add_a_POSIX_Timing_Test for more details
